publications.name: Limits of water maser kinematics: insights from the high-mass protostar AFGL 5142-MM1
publications.publisher: Monthly Notices of the Royal Astronomical Society
publications.summary: Multi-epoch VLBI observations measures 3D velocities of masers in MYSO outflows, assuming that they co-propagate with the shock. Our water maser data for a bowshock outflow in AFGL5142 depicts that they actually propagate slower than the bowshock. This underlines the importance of long-term monitoring of maser kinematics to understand the true nature of the outflows.
